column6: AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED TIE-IN! "RAGNAROK" PART 4 (OF 6) What makes a god? Is it birthright, is it happenstance, or is it in the making? Thor finds out the hard way as he seeks answers on how to face the coming end of his people. Thor struggles with the kno
